content: Hi I’m Jorge! 😄 I discovered in Valencia the word of nanoscience where I did a Master and then I started my PhD about photovoltaic devices in the group of Henk Bolink. I am fascinated about new renevable energy sources and interested in computer science. I enjoy so much competitive programming challenges!!
